title: Why the fuck am I losing full LP for games like this?
body:
Entire team is feeding and Cass at top is trolling. At her fourth death, we told her to just farm and wait until late game, to which she responded 'nah idc, just want to lose asap, not going to try with this troll team comp'

http://i.imgur.com/qEaBF1X.jpg

I somehow carry this retardation, bottom lane got it's shit together, and Cass continued doing stupid shit to try to make us lose, without making it seem like intentional feeding.

http://i.imgur.com/twCTPuL.jpg

There is zero reason I should have lost 20 LP for this game.

replies.body: Ok, I expect you to make a complaint post next time someone on the enemy team trolls and you get 20LP. Something tells me it won't happen.

You lost the game...In what world does it entitle you to keep your lp.
Next time win the game.

Carrying means you won the game which didn't happen. 

LP loss is based on your MMR which is based on your winrate. That is the best determiner of your performance. The more meaningful impacts you make, the more games you win. 4,000 kills wouldn't matter if you never got the nexus.
You have far more losses than wins, win more and it won't hurt as much.

Love how this one is Downvoted to hell, when yet the other posts like http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/tV0dqGr7-why-the-fuck-did-i-just-lose-18-lp-for-a-3v5 is upvoted? lolol.

GJ community, you make no sense at all.

In the end, you lost, you didn't win, you get what you get.
